content: necronomicon ex-mortis bag book of the dead thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size about 9 tall 7 wide and 3 deep materials worsted weight #4 yarn ~about 200 yards total o in brown black tan red 5mm hook black felt plastic canvas preferably black needle tacky glue/hot glue scissors gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches to know us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch half_double_crochet -half_double_crochet skip -skip double_crochet -double_crochet st -stitch fsc -foundation single_crochet chain -chain surface slip_stitch single_crochet -single_crochet pattern notes # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for # stitches designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items inside panels make 2 with black row 1 chain 25 starting in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in each chain across chain 1 turn 24 2 - 21 half_double_crochet in each chain across chain 1 turn fasten_off after row 21 front back panel with brown row 1 chain 25 starting in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in each chain across chain 1 turn 24 2 - 21 half_double_crochet in each chain across chain 1 continue to boarder after row 21 boarder line up an inside panel behind the front back panel rotate work to work along the long side and continue as follows long side going through both layers evenly place 24 scs along edge chain 1 and rotate to short side short side going through both layers single_crochet in each of the 21 sts chain 1 and rotate to long side long side going through both layers evenly place 24 scs along edge chain 1 and rotate to short side and set aside cut a piece of plastic canvas to fit between your two panels and insert short side going through both layers single_crochet in each of the 21 sts chain 1 and slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items front face panel with brown the face will not look correct until we add the finishing touches at the end so don t worry row 1 chain 25 starting in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in each chain across chain 1 turn 24 2 - 4 3 row half_double_crochet in each chain across chain 1 turn eyes we will now be working in separate sections 5 1 half_double_crochet in next 8 sts chain 1 turn leave rest of row unworked 6 1 slip_stitch in first st chain 1 half_double_crochet in next 7 sts chain 1 turn fasten_off go back to row 4 and skip st attach yarn in next st with a slip_stitch 5 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as join half_double_crochet in next 5 sts chain 1 turn leaving remaining sts unworked on row 4 6 2 slip_stitch in
